---
```{r echo=FALSE}
options(knitr.table.format = "latex")
options(kableExtra.latex.load_packages = TRUE)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
source("functions.R")
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
cap <- "Outcomes Survey Response Rates by Program Level"
cols <- c("Program Level", "Total Graduates", "Total Respondents", "Response Rate")
Table1(datasetInput()) %>%
      kable(digits = 2,
            caption = cap,
            col.names = cols) %>%
      kable_styling(full_width = TRUE) %>%
      row_spec(0, bold = TRUE)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
cap <- "Overall Satisfaction with Webster"
cols <- c("Please indicate your level of agreement with the following:", 
          "Overall Avg.", "GRAD Avg.", "UNGD Avg.")
foot <- "Strongly Agree (4); Mostly Agree (3); Mostly Disagree (2); Strongly Disagree (1)"
TableQ(datasetInput(), c("Q101", "Q102")) %>%
      kable(digits = 2,
            col.names = cols,
            caption = cap,
            booktabs = TRUE) %>%
      kable_styling(latex_options = "striped", full_width = TRUE) %>%
      row_spec(0, bold = TRUE) %>%
      column_spec(1, "30em") %>% 
      footnote(foot,
               general_title = "Scale:",
               footnote_as_chunk = TRUE)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
cap <- "Career Outcomes - Employment"
cols <- c("Please indicate your level of agreement with the following: ", 
          "Overall Avg.", "GRAD Avg.", "UNGD Avg.")
foot1 <- "Strongly Agree (4); Mostly Agree (3); Mostly Disagree (2); Strongly Disagree (1)"
foot2 <- "Averages are based on respondent who indicated they were employed full- or part-time as their primary activity."
TableQ(datasetInput(), paste0("Q", 108:109)) %>%
      kable(digits = 2,
            col.names = cols,
            caption = cap,
            booktabs = TRUE) %>%
      kable_styling(latex_options = "striped", full_width = TRUE) %>%
      row_spec(0, bold = TRUE) %>%
      column_spec(1, "30em") %>% 
      footnote(foot1,
               general_title = "Scale:",
               footnote_as_chunk = TRUE) %>%
        footnote(foot2,
               general_title = "Note:",
               footnote_as_chunk = TRUE)
```
